Name: Crimson Colosseum
About the game: Against her father's wishes, Sachi took up her sword and went on a quest to prove herself as a capable swordswoman. However, her journey quickly came to an end as she was ambushed by a group on the way back, who swiftly captured and took her to a mysterious colosseum hidden within the city. With a curse placed on her, she is told she must fight in the arena in order to get back home alive. Features Action-Based Combat In-Depth Skill System Diverse Game Mechanics Dynamic Plot
Meta Title: Crimson Colosseum: Jul 30, 2021, Enokippu and Full Overview
